hero.description: The read-it-later app that sends you a daily digest with AI summaries of the articles you saved. So you know what's inside — without reading everything.

stats.sectionTitle: Saving articles you never actually read?

steps.title: Save the article
steps.description: Click the extension while reading. Works with Medium and Substack paywalled content too.

steps.title: Laterr summarizes
steps.description: AI reads the article and creates a 3-5 key point summary. In 30 seconds.

steps.title: Get the digest
steps.description: Every evening, an email with summaries of everything you saved today.

steps.title: Read (for real)
steps.description: After the summary, decide what's actually worth reading in full.

items.title: Works with paywalled articles
items.description: If you can read it, we can save it. The extension captures content while you're on the page.

items.title: AI summary in 30 seconds
items.description: 3-5 key points per article. Know what it's about instantly, without reading everything.

items.title: Evening email digest
items.description: No need to open another app. Everything arrives in your inbox, when you have time.

items.title: Clean reader mode
items.description: When you want to read the full article: zero ads, zero distractions, just the text.

items.title: Privacy-first
items.description: Your articles are yours. We don't track, sell, or share.

items.title: Works everywhere
items.description: Medium, Substack, New York Times, blogs, any website. If it has text, we save it.
